00032 /**
00033  * @brief Class to store allele frequency data
00034  */
00035 class AlleleFrequency
00036 {
00037 public:
00038     AffxString SNPID;
00039     double AAlleleFrequency;
00040     double BAlleleFrequency;
00041 };
00042 
00043 /**
00044  * @brief Comparison predicate for AlleleFrequency pointers
00045  */
00046 struct AlleleFreqComp : std::binary_function<const AlleleFrequency*, const AlleleFrequency*, bool>
00047 {
00048     bool operator()(const AlleleFrequency* lhs, const AlleleFrequency* rhs) const {
00049         return lhs->SNPID < rhs->SNPID;
00050     }
00051 };
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Functor to delete objects from vectors of pointers
00055  */
00056 struct DeleteAlleleFreq
00057 {
00058     template<class T>
00059     void operator()(const T* p) const {
00060         delete p;
00061     }
00062 };

00072 class CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD : public CNFamilialAnalysisMethod

00109     virtual bool isSegmentOverlapAnalysis() {return false;}
00110     virtual bool isSegmentTypeAnalysis() {return false;}
00111     virtual AffxString getName() {return getType();}
00112     virtual void run();

00115     int getAlleleFreqSize() {return m_vAlleleFrequencies.size();}
